allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: FTA-Manager PowerShell module

Implements file type and protocol association management for Windows 10/11
by computing the correct UserChoice hash that Windows requires since Win8.

Features:
- Set/Get/Remove File Type Associations (FTA)
- Set/Get/Remove Protocol Associations (PTA)
- UCPD (User Choice Protection Driver) detection and management
- Find ProgIds for extensions
- List all registered applications

Based on research from PS-SFTA and SetUserFTA projects.
